title: Raymond 750-DR32TT 3200lb Capacity Standing Forklift With Charger
item_description:
Raymond 750-DR32TT 3200lb Capacity Standing Forklift With Charger

  • Manufacturer: Raymond
  • Model: 750-DR32TT
  • Load Capacity: 3200lb

  • Mast Type: Three Stage
  • Truck Weight: 8870lbs

Removal Note: This lot is only available for removal July 14-18, 2025, from 9:00AM to 3:30PM each day. Removal appointments are required for pickup.
